Uses of Package
org.deri.any23.extractor

Packages that use org.deri.any23.extractor
org.deri.any23 The Any23 root package defines the Any23 library facade. 
org.deri.any23.cli This package contains some command-line utilities allowing the user to interact with any23 via shell. 
org.deri.any23.extractor This package contains classes and interfaces acting as a domain model for various extractors 
org.deri.any23.extractor.html All the various Extractor needed to distill RDF from Microformats in HTML pages are contained in this package. 
org.deri.any23.extractor.rdf This package contains the concrete implementations (and utilities classes) to perform the extraction from various RDF serialization formats. 
org.deri.any23.extractor.rdfa Package containing all the needed code for the Extractor for RDFa. 
org.deri.any23.filter This package defines specific TripleHandlers able to filter document and triples that don't respect particular conditions. 
org.deri.any23.writer This package collects a set of TripleHandler decorators and specific format writers. 
 

Classes in org.deri.any23.extractor used by org.deri.any23
ExtractionException
          Defines a specific exception raised during the metadata extraction phase.
 

Classes in org.deri.any23.extractor used by org.deri.any23.cli

          Defines a specific exception raised during the metadata extraction phase.
 

Classes in org.deri.any23.extractor used by org.deri.any23.extractor
ExtractionException
          Defines a specific exception raised during the metadata extraction phase.
ExtractionResult
          Interface defining the methods that a representation of an extraction result must have.
ExtractionResult.Error
          This class defines a generic error traced by this extraction result.
ExtractionResult.ErrorLevel
           
Extractor
          It defines the signature of a generic Extractor.
ExtractorDescription
          It defines a minimal signature for an Extractor description.
ExtractorFactory
          Interface defining a factory for Extractor.
ExtractorGroup
          It simple models a group of ExtractorFactory providing simple accessing methods.
ExtractorRegistry
          Singleton class acting as a register for all the various Extractor.
